data.comment: The big names in today's match at Madejski Stadium have now been confirmed.
Reading kick-off to get the first-half underway.
In the minute 29, Birmingham take a 0-1 lead thanks to Jon Toral.
Jon Toral puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
Scott Hogan for Birmingham has been booked by Tim Robinson and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Madejski Stadium.
The second-half has commenced. Birmingham with the kick-off.
The home team have replaced Michael Olise with Alfa Semedo. This is the first substitution made today by Veljko Paunovic.
In the minute 61, Goal! The home team reduce the deficit to 1-2 through a strike by Yakou Meite. .
Tomas Esteves is replacing Tom Holmes for Reading at Madejski Stadium.
Harlee Dean (Birmingham) gets a yellow card.
Reading have been awarded a penalty in Reading...
In the minute 70, Red card in Reading! Harlee Dean has been shown a second yellow card by Tim Robinson.
Birmingham make their first substitution with Gary Gardner replacing Ivan Sanchez.
In the minute 74, Lukas Jutkiewicz is on a sub for Scott Hogan for Birmingham.
Aitor Karanka (Birmingham) is making a third substitution, with Mikel San Jose replacing Jon Toral.
Birmingham's Neil Etheridge has been booked in Reading.
In the minute 83, Veljko Paunovic is making the team's third substitution at Madejski Stadium with Sone Aluko replacing Ovie Ejaria.
Full-time! The final score is 1-2.
Yakou Meite (Reading) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
